name: Amapo
description:
This game was created for the Global Game Jam 22 from Jan 21 to Jan 23 (48h). 

You have to play two characters. One of them during the day and the other one at night. Each one can clear the path for the other player. Try to escape from the labyrinth in as few day/night cycles as possible.

#How to play:

Move - WASD

Look around - Mouse

Change to day/night - Shift

# Credits
